body: Finally found something that is pure Vanilla, no more NTR and Ugly Bastard
The artist has confirmed an English version. Check them out on Twitter if you're interested (@snowrich114)

@Kytsunee1 dude Shinji has been raping Sakura daily ever since she put a step into his home along with his grandfather that has been physically abusing her and putting all sort of shit into her body 
she was literally a sex doll between her adopted brother and his grandfather 
it also implied that she went to Shinji sometimes to have sex with him to calm her down since those worms in sakura's body were causing her getting her horny as fuck and messing up with her sanity , Shinji told her in the movie that " maybe i should tell Emiya how many times you have begged me and how obscene our relationship was " implying that it wasn't just rape all the time but sometimes she would go to him for a release
i can't express enough how fucked up this route was , it also makes me think was she thinking of Shirou fucking her instead of Shinji all these years ?! just to make this whole fucked up situation a bit acceptable to her when Shinji was doing her all this time !
Finally, some vanilla rin x shirou doujin. Tired of rape shit
Pure vanilla goodness. This warmed my heart. I love it <3

@Codevine That's your own damn fault for being too sensitive. There is nothing wrong with a series taking dark turns touching upon those topics if  they aren't even doing so distastefully. I mean, what the hell could you have expected from a character who in the other two Stay Night routes & Fate/Zero was teased and shown to have had a psychological and emotionally abusive childhood.

@Codevine my man, the only thing Sakura’s Route had was implying that she had been abused at the Matou Household for ten years. What are you talking about? What NTR? And why would you stop enjoying any Fate/Stay Night Content just because the story decides to explore the darker sides of it’s premise?

Rin's route was the best route in the series , Sakura's route was the most fucked up route in the series , NTR - rape - weird shit - creeps etc.. you name it , it was like a story straight outta Hentai , her route was also one of the reasons i stopped watching anything related to Fate/stay night because i lost my respect to the author
Shirou x rin always a good thing to see
Rin x Shirou doujins are always the best. The anime did us dirty by not even showing the kiss, but the university set-up is perfect for doujins like this.

Holy shit, Sweet vanilla (even though I can’t understand Japanese)
This is what I always wanted.
Thank you, this doujin is amazing.
